means: 自由主义者( liberal的名词复数 )
支持（社会、政治或宗教）变革的人

sentence.Network_en: Public employees, teachers and liberals are circulating a petition for his recall.
sentence.Network_cn: 公务员、教师和自由派人士正在散发请愿书,要求将他召回.

sentence.Network_en: For the time being, the liberals seem to have carried the day.
sentence.Network_cn: 眼下似乎是自由主义者占据了上风。

sentence.Network_en: Public policy on the family presents liberals with a dilemma.
sentence.Network_cn: 有关家庭的公共政策使自由主义者陷入了进退两难的境地。

PerfectNetExp.abs: The change for which Polish liberals had been waiting since 1956 had come ., 波兰自由派人士自 1956年起就一直期待的变革终于到来了.
he aligned himself with the liberals .他与自由党人结成联盟。
liberals might experiment with income-affirmative action , for example , or with vouchers that give more money to the poor .譬如，自由人士可能会试行针对收入的反歧视行动或分发给予穷人更多钱的代金券。

list.abs: 英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... liberate v 解放，释放 liberation n 解放；释放 libertine n 浪荡子.
英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... liberate v 解放，释放 liberation n 解放；释放 libertine n 浪荡子.
高考阅读高频单词_百度文库 ... campus n. 校园 16. liberal a. 慷慨的；丰富的；自由的 17. transform v. 转变,变革；变换 18.
英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... liberty n 自由 liberal a 自由的；慷慨的 liberate v 解放，释放.
...哲学家罗尔斯(John Rawls)的理论，来说明自由主义(liberalism)的政治设计。

entry.tran: 开明的；开通的；（个人）自由主义的
entry.def: Someone who has liberal views believes people should have a lot of freedom in deciding how to behave and think.

example.ex: She is known to have liberal views on divorce and contraception.
example.tran: 众所周知，她在离婚与避孕方面思想很开明。

entry.tran: （制度等）开放的；（政治或经济上）自由主义的
entry.def: A liberal system allows people or organizations a lot of political or economic freedom.

example.ex: ...a liberal democracy with a multiparty political system...
example.tran: 多党政制的自由民主国家
他们支持开放的自由市场政策。

entry.tran: 自由党的;支持自由党的
entry.def: A Liberal politician or voter is a member of a Liberal Party or votes for a Liberal Party.

example.ex: The Liberal leader has announced his party's withdrawal from the ruling coalition.
example.tran: 自由党领袖已宣布该党退出执政联盟。

entry.tran: 慷慨的；肆意的；大量的；丰富的
entry.def: Liberal means giving, using, or taking a lot of something, or existing in large quantities.

example.ex: As always he is liberal with his jokes...
example.tran: 像平时一样，他出口就是笑话。

example.ex: She made liberal use of her elder sister's make-up and clothes.
example.tran: 她随便把姐姐的化妆品和衣服拿来用。

auth_sentence.content: Liberals in the west look on baffled and horrified.
auth_sentence.res_content: Liberals in the west look on baffled and horrified.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Liberals in the west look on baffled and horrified.

auth_sentence.content: Perhaps there were more liberals who saw the gorilla.
auth_sentence.res_content: Perhaps there were more liberals who saw the gorilla.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Perhaps there were more liberals who saw the gorilla.

auth_sentence.content: Liberals do a more than adequate job of that.
auth_sentence.res_content: Liberals do a more than adequate job of that.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Liberals do a more than adequate job of that.
